id: questionnaire-example-audit

meta:

contained: , ,

url: http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-questionnaire/Questionnaire/questionnaire-example-audit

identifier: business-identifier2

title: The Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test (AUDIT) Form

status: draft

code: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test [AUDIT] (Details: LOINC code 72110-0 = '72110-0', stated as 'Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test [AUDIT]')

subjectType: Patient

item

linkId: apanel

text: The Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test: Self-Report Version Because alcohol use can affect your health and can interfere with certain medications and treatments, it is important that we ask some questions about your use of alcohol. Your answers will remain confidential so please be honest. Place an X in one box that best describes your answer to each question.

type: display

item

linkId: a1

code: 68518-0 (Details: LOINC code 68518-0 = '68518-0', stated as 'null')

prefix: 1.

text: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?

type: choice

required: true

options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained

item

linkId: a2

code: 68519-8 (Details: LOINC code 68519-8 = '68519-8', stated as 'null')

prefix: 2.

text: How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?

type: choice

required: true

options: SAMHSA-drinks a day / 1 or 2/3 or 4/5 or 6/7 to 9/10 or more. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained

item

linkId: a3

code: 68520-6 (Details: LOINC code 68520-6 = '68520-6', stated as 'null')

prefix: 3.

text: How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?

type: choice

required: true

options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained

item

linkId: a4

prefix: 4.

text: How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?

type: choice

required: true

options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained

item

linkId: a5

prefix: 5.

text: How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected of you because of drinking?

type: choice

required: true

options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained

item

linkId: a6

prefix: 6.

text: How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?

type: choice

required: true

options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained

item

linkId: a7

prefix: 7.

text: How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?

type: choice

required: true

options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained

item

linkId: a8

prefix: 8.

text: How often during the last year have you been unable to remem­ber what happened the night before because of your drinking?

type: choice

required: true

options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained

item

linkId: a9

prefix: 9.

text: Have you or someone else been injured because of your drinking?

type: choice

required: true

options: No|Yes, but not in the last year|Yes, during the last year. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained

item

linkId: a10

code: 44256-6 (Details: LOINC code 44256-6 = '44256-6', stated as 'null')

prefix: 10.

text: Has a relative, friend, doctor, or other health care worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?

type: choice

required: true

options: No|Yes, but not in the last year|Yes, during the last year. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained

concept.display: Yes, but not in the last year

title: The Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test (AUDIT) Form

item.text: The Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test: Self-Report Version Because alcohol use can affect your health and can interfere with certain medications and treatments, it is important that we ask some questions about your use of alcohol. Your answers will remain confidential so please be honest. Place an X in one box that best describes your answer to each question.
How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?

options.display: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily

item.text: How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?

options.display: SAMHSA-drinks a day / 1 or 2/3 or 4/5 or 6/7 to 9/10 or more

item.text: How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?

options.display: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily

item.text: How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?

options.display: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily

item.text: How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected of you because of drinking?

options.display: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily

item.text: How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?

options.display: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily

item.text: How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?

options.display: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily

item.text: How often during the last year have you been unable to remem­ber what happened the night before because of your drinking?

options.display: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily

item.text: Have you or someone else been injured because of your drinking?

options.display: No|Yes, but not in the last year|Yes, during the last year

item.text: Has a relative, friend, doctor, or other health care worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?

options.display: No|Yes, but not in the last year|Yes, during the last year
